info.description: API documentation for the Annotation Backend Service
info.title: Papel Annotation Backend

get.summary: Get annotations with related to the article endpoint.

503.description: Internal error occurred. Check the cause field for the diagnostics.

post.description: Creates annotation and returns created annotation as response. This endpoint will be called when a user highlight a text from an article

parameters.name: annotation
parameters.description: The annotation to be created.(In the body non of creator and created info will be sent. Only:  type, motivation, body->type,body->value,body->purpose,target->id,target->selector->type,target->selector->start,target->selector->end need to be sent)

200.description: OK. Successfully signed up. A verification email is sent.

503.description: Internal error occurred. Check the cause field for the diagnostics.

post.summary: Add body to an existing annotation endpoint
post.description: Creates annotation and returns created annotation as response. This endpoint will be called when a user highlight a text from an article

parameters.name: annotationId
parameters.description: Annotation ID for adding new body (comment) to the annotation

parameters.name: body of annotation
parameters.description: New annotation body for adding new body(comment) to a existing annotation. A user could add comment on a someone else's annotation. Only:  type,value and purpose will be sent)

200.description: OK. Successfully signed up. A verification email is sent.

503.description: Internal error occurred. Check the cause field for the diagnostics.

type.description: Type of the receiving response (This is always equal to "Annotation")

creator.description: Id of the creator of this annotation.

created.description: Date when the annotation is created.

motivation.description: Motivation of the annotation (In our project it is highlighting and it is default value)

target.description: Target information of the annotation. It declares article ID which the annotation points to and includes starts and end indexes of the article body

_id.description: Id of the body. Important for deleting the body of the annotation (will be implemented soon)

type.description: Type of the body (For now this is always equal to "TextualBody"

value.description: Actual content of the body. This is like comment on the highlighted text. For example lyric explanation comment of the highlighted lyric for a music)
value.example: This is comment on highlight on the first passage

format.description: Format of the body. I think it is unnecessary but It may stay

purpose.description: Purpose of the body. In our case It may only equals "commenting"

creator.description: Id of the creator of this body. (It returns only user ID now. username and surname will be added soon)

created.description: Date when the body(comment) is created.

_id.description: Database Id of the target.will be never used Not Important

id.description: Actual Id of the target.In our project it is article ID

source.description: Source of the target. In our case it is article url which is pointed (Unnecessary)

format.description: Format of the body. I think it is unnecessary but It may stay

type.description: Selector type. It is important it defines targeted element is article text or article image(For now it is only equal to DataPositionSelector)

start.description: If the selector type == DataPositionSelector then this declares start position of the highlighted text on the article text

end.description: If the selector type == DataPositionSelector then this declares end position of the highlighted text on the article text

selector.description: Defines which part of the article is annotated
